name: WooCommerce Fullscreen Image Zoom
author: Barfaraz

sections.description:
Overview

An easy-to-use WooCommerce plugin which makes fullscreen image zooming available. This plugin presents a magnified product images to your customers.

Frontend demo

Features

  • Viewing the details of the product images better
  • Fully responsive and 100% customizable
  • Easy-to-use & light plugin
  • Easy settings panel
  • Slider for products & fullscreen thumbnails

Pro version

  • Vertical slider for large gallery
  • Change thumbnails border, preloader and fullscreen colors
  • Fade-in images on loading
  • More preloaders

purchase Pro version
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

Release Date – 8 May 2017

  • Fixed a bug in javascripts

1.0.2

Release Date – 9 May 2017

  • Fixed some problems in settings page
  • Change preloader style
  • Some changes

1.0.3

Release Date – 10 May 2017

  • Add thumbnails border width in settings page
  • Add preloader skins in settings page

1.0.4

Release Date – 10 May 2017

  • Some changes in settings page
